get order flowers now for gerald 's visitation service. jun 13. 2:00 pm stewart family funeral home7525 old jacksonville hwy. tyler, tx, us, 75703. get order flowers now for gerald 's service cemetery details. walnut grove cemeterytx, usget show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of gerald "leon" shubert send comfort to the shubert family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! fd fay dickerson. jun 10 at 5:03 pm mr. shubert was a godly man. he loved his family as he loved the lord. the many times we were with the family, he had little words to speak but his character spoke volumes of the type of christian he was in his every day life. may god comfort all of you in days ahead. sending our love and prayers. fay dickerson (baytown, tx)kay dickerson (the woodlands, tx)comment share comment share facebook twitter
